thread.title: New No More Heroes Is Coming to Nintendo Switch
thread.title_full: New No More Heroes Is Coming to Nintendo Switch

author: Miranda Sanchez
title: New No More Heroes Is Coming to Nintendo Switch
text:
“Travis Touchdown 
will be making his return on Nintendo Switch,” Suda51 of Grasshopper Manufacture announced at the Nintendo Switch event. 
It's not clear whether or not this game will share the No More Heroes title, but Suda51 said the game with Travis is in development and is "heavily influenced by pro wrestling." 
No development timeline or estimated release date was shared for the unnamed game. 


Miranda Sanchez is an Editor at IGN. You can talk to her about video games, anime, and handsome robots on Twitter .
